name: project-1-aloha
description: This is the first project I've created using html/css. It is designed to be the front page of Aloha fashion.  This website displays all the required information and link in an effective and aesthetically pleaseing manner. I have organized all divs with classes and/or ids so that they are easily targetted with css I included a css reset and used all the required fonts and layout requirements as stated by the rubric
